description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[The Chinese: a general description of the Empire of China and its inhabitants ... Illustrated with woodcuts.]" Author: DAVIS, John Francis - Sir, Bart Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10057.bbb.28." Page: 815 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1857 Publisher: John Murray Edition: [Another edition.] China: a general description of that empire and its inhabitants; with the history of foreign intercourse down to the events which produced the dissolution of 1857 ... A new edition, revised and enlarged, etc. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000879646 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here. Please note that you will need to enter details from the above list - such as the shelfmark, the page, the book's volume and so on - when filling out your order. Following this or the link above will take you to the British Library's integrated catalogue. You will be able to download a PDF of the book this image is taken from, as well as view the pages up close with the 'itemViewer'.
